text: Germany is scheduled to compete at the 2022 Winter Olympics in Beijing, China, from 4 to 20 February 2022. == Ice hockey == Germany has qualified 25 male competitors to the ice hockey tournament. ===Men's tournament=== Germany men's national ice hockey team qualified by being ranked 7th in the 2019 IIHF World Rankings. They will play in Group A. ==References== Category:Nations at the 2022 Winter Olympics 2022 Winter Olympics
title: Germany at the 2022 Winter Olympics
